alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 4:59PM EDT until May 09 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Mecklenburg County in south central Virginia... Southern Lunenburg County in south central Virginia... West central Brunswick County in south central Virginia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 458 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dundas to near Kells Corner to near Wylliesburg, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... South Hill around 520 PM EDT. Brodnax around 530 PM EDT. Boydton around 540 PM EDT. La Crosse around 545 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Gary, Bacons Fork, Wilburn, Gills Corner, Loves Mill, North View, Finneywood, Meredithville, Forksville and Lafoon Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
